topics.body:
Behold Thanotos Omega's simple solution to diversity in design,

1: Is this character's race/gender important to them in anyway? If Yes all others can be skipped because it would harm the character to make a change,

2: If No to 1, does this character's race and or gender match a majority of existing character's? If yes then change and move on to 3,

3: If it is not important does this character's race or Gender cause any stereotypes? if yes make adjustments,

With this system you yield a diverse cast without harming them and make sure to avoid unfortunate implications,
topics.author: 509f70a87f123b77eb0004fd
